name: Nigh7mares
description:
Nigh7mares is a game based on storytelling and cards in a 2D vertical platformer body.

It's about Magnus, a magician accused of murdering his assistant and, to prove his innocence, he has to risk his life performing the magic trick "The 7 Nightmares". 
In this dreamlike trick he fights against shadowy creatures through matches of a game similar to blackjack.

His objective is to defeat seven bosses and gain access to fragments of the real killer's memory.

Team

  • João Rodrigues - Game Designer
  • Rodrigo Pereira - Game Developer
  • Valeriya Haponyuk - Game Artist
